content: DETROIT  Sept 18 Gentex Corp is broadening its role from a traditional Michigan-based auto parts maker to a supplier of high-tech vision systems that eventually could be integrated into self-driving cars.
name: Gentex Corporation
title: Gentex transforms rear-view mirror into high-tech vision system
